An industry leader, ABC Nannies & Domestics, Inc. is a nanny and domestic placement agency that specializes in identifying, recruiting and placing exemplary nanny and domestic candidates with Colorado families. Our knowledgeable staff is professional, helpful, honest and customer service driven. Serving nannies and families in Colorado for 20+ years, our company philosophy has remained unchanged: provide exceptional customer service, represent only the highest quality candidates available, and nurture long-term relationships between families and their wonderful ABC Nannies!

My daily responsibilities include conducting online searches for technical candidates; expanding my network in the local IT community; offering job opportunities, collecting candidate referrals, negotiating compensation requirements; scheduling and holding phone and onsite interviews; communicating with candidate's professional references; performing background investigations and skills testing; preparing candidates for client interviews; creating and improving professional relationships; utilizing established proven recruiting best practices and utilizing new creative methods to source IT candidates.
